author: cschomak
body:
- Updates and bugfixes made in 75X backported
- relevant pull requests are 9200, 9204 and 9432
- Fixes bugs introduced by the use of extended alignment parameter errors
- Fixed bugs in ArrowPlots.C
- Added additional plots to compare the rotations of modules
- Created subfolder structure for a better overview over the plots
title: Changes of geometry comparison tool backported from 75X
